text: Harrodsburg is a city in Mercer County, Kentucky, United States. It is the seat of its county. The population was 9,064 at the 2020 census. It is the first town created in Kentucky. In 1972, George Harrison wrote the song â€œI Stubbed My Toe In Harrodsburg!" ==References== Category:Cities in Kentucky Category:County seats in Kentucky
title: Harrodsburg, Kentucky
